definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: front, in front of (deriv. dub.; acc. to Ol:§ 223 c Sta:§ 378 a, for [[מְאוֹל]] from [[אוּל]] to be in front: v. further Kö:ii. 300 f. Hpt:BAS i. 172):—

definitions.title: 1. subst.
definitions.body: only 1Ki 7:5 (si vera 1.: v. Sta:ZAW 1883, 151) [[וּמוּל מֶחֱזׇה אֶל־מֶחֱזׇה]] and the front of (one) window was towards (the other) window, and Ne 12:38 [[לְמוֹאל]] = in the opposite direction (but rd. prob. [[לִשְׂמאוֹל]], cf. [[לַיָּמִין]] v:Ne 12:31).

definitions.title: prep.,
definitions.body: De 1:1, De 2:19 [[מוּל בני עמון]] in front of the Ammonites, De 3:29 (= De 4:46, De 34:6) [[מוּל בית פעור]], De 11:30, Jos 18:18, Jos 19:46 [[מוּל יָפוֹ]] 1Sa 14:5, 1Sa 14:5; fig. Ex 18:19 [[הֱיֵת אַתָּה לעם מול האלהים]] in front of  God, i.e. representing God to them. With prefixes:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[אל־מול]] towards the front of, 1Sa 17:30 [[מֵאֶחְלוֹ אֶל־מוּל אַחֵר וַיִּסׂב]] to the front of another; on the front of, Ex 34:3 (pregn.) [[וְאַל־יִרְעוּ אל־מול ההר]], Jo 8:33, Jo 8:33, Jo 9:1, Jo 22:11 (v. WAW:JPh. xiii. 117 ff.); spec. [[מוּל פְּנֵי אֶל־]] towards or on the forefront of, Ex 26:9, Ex 28:25 (‖ Ex 39:18), v:Ex 28:37, Le 8:9, Nu 8:2, Nu 8:3, 2Sa 11:15 set ye Uriah [[אל־מול פני המלחמה]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[מִמּוּל]]:—(a) from the front of, Mic 2:8 (text dub.: rd. prob. [[מֵעַל]]). (b) of position, off (v. [[מן]]

definitions.title: 1 c
definitions.body: ) the front of, Le 5:8 [[מִמּוּל עָרְפּוֹ]] off the front of  its neck, i.e. close in front of it, Nu 22:5 [[והוא יושׁב מִמֻּלִי]] close in front of me, 2Sa 5:23 (1Ch 14:14) [[ממול בכאים ובאת להם]] come to them off the front of  the mulberry-trees, 1Ki 7:39 (2Ch 4:10) [[מִמּוּל נֶגֶב]]; [[מִמּוּל פָּנׇיו]] on the forefront of, Ex 28:27 (‖ Ex 39:20).
